mapper.insert: insert into car(car_id, car_no, car_color, tire_change_distance, wiper_change_distance, cooler_left, engine_oil_viscosity, distance) values(#{car_id},select nvl(max(car_no),0)+1 from car),#{car_color},#{tire_change_distance},#{wiper_change_distance},#{cooler_left},#{engine_oil_viscosity},#{distance})
mapper.update: update car set cooler_left=#{cooler_left} where car_id=#{car_id}
update car set engine_oil_left=#{engine_oil_viscosity} where car_id=#{car_id}
update car set distance=#{distance} where car_id=#{car_id}
